content.code:
Return work to your teacher.

If you take a test:

  • your answers will be automatically marked and the results available for your teacher to see.

If you complete an assignment:

  1. Click on the name of your assignment to open it
  2. Click on the menu on the left hand edge of the screen to expand it
  3. Click on the menu item Introduction
  4. Click the Browse button and select the file that you wish to send ot your teacher
  5. Click OK

Show me how to return work to my teacher.
